abstract: A brief report in the Haggler column last Sunday, about Internet service from Hughes Network Systems, referred incorrectly to download speeds in a reader’s service plan. Hughes says that this particular plan offers speeds of up to 700 kbps, with typical speeds at peak times of 400 to 500; it does not promise 700.

lead_paragraph: A brief report in the Haggler column last Sunday, about Internet service from Hughes Network Systems, referred incorrectly to download speeds in a reader’s service plan. Hughes says that this particular plan offers speeds of up to 700 kbps, with typical speeds at peak times of 400 to 500; it does not promise 700.
